edge: Henry Jackman, who had previously collaborated with Vaughn in Kick-Ass (2010), composed the pop-and-rock infused incidental music for First Class.
Henry Jackman drew inspiration from John Barry's musical themes, which had a 'posh pop' musical style,
Henry Jackman produced a 'Superman-style theme' in the final parts of the film,
The original score album was released digitally by Sony Classical Records on June 6, 2011,
Followed by a physical release on July 4, 2011,
